meanings.definition: The quality of being annoying or troublesome.
meanings.sent1: Her constant peskinesses made it hard to focus on my work.
meanings.sent2: I can't stand the peskinesses of that noisy neighbor.
meanings.sent3: The peskinesses of the buzzing mosquito kept me up all night.
meanings.sent4: The peskinesses of the dripping faucet echoed through the house like a never-ending drumbeat.
meanings.sent5: The peskinesses of the squeaky door was like a persistent reminder of its need for oil.

meanings.sent1: His peskinesses at the party annoyed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The child's peskinesses in class disrupted the lesson.
meanings.sent3: The peskinesses of the mischievous puppy always brought a smile to our faces.
meanings.sent4: Her peskinesses were like a playful dance, always keeping us on our toes.
meanings.sent5: The peskinesses of the persistent salesperson were hard to ignore.
